titles.title: 559 Day Is Dying In The West (familiar easy very n

comments.comment:
verse 4 (optional)
[above are Song Tags with notes imported from EasyWorship]

authors.author: Mary Artemisia Lathbury | William Fiske Sherwin

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Day is dying in the west
Heaven is touching earth with rest
Wait and worship while the night
Sets her evening lamps alight
Thro' all the sky

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Holy holy holy Lord God of hosts
Heaven and earth are full of Thee
Heaven and earth are praising Thee
O Lord Most High

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Lord of life beneath the dome
Of the universe Thy home
Gather us who seek Thy face
To the fold of Thy embrace
For Thou art nigh

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
While the deepning shadows fall
Heart of Love enfolding all
Through the glory and the grace
Of the stars that veil Thy face
Our hearts ascend

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
When forever from our sight
Pass the stars the day the night
Lord of angels on our eyes
Let eternal morning rise
And shadows end
